column1:
The 
instant  application  for  revision  has  been  filled  to  set  aside  the  order  dated

27.08.2021  of  the  high  Court  of  Gampaha.  The  accused 
in  this  matter  namely

AlahakoonArachchilageNamalNishantha  has  been 
indicted 
in 
the  High  Court 
for
possession and trafficking of 8.5 grams of Heroin. The accused had been arrested in
19.07.2019. Indictment has been forwarded on 28.04.2021. The trial is to be taken up
on  the  08.04.2022.  The  main  grievance  of  the  petitioner  is  that,  there  is  a  delay  of
